titles.title: A bill to require full and complete public disclosure of the terms of home mortgages held by Members of Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary:
9/23/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require Members of Congress to include in mandatory annual financial disclosure reports information on the balance of any mortgage secured by a personal residence.
